function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation between feeling of safety and feeling of comfort with willingness to use public transport after the epidemic","Impact":"Policies may not be aligned with the factors that influence passengers' willingness to use public transport, leading to decreased ridership.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to validate the correlation and adjust transport policies accordingly.","Technologies":"Survey tools for data collection, statistical analysis software for correlation testing.","People":"Passengers, policymakers, transportation authorities.","Owner":"Research organizations, transportation authorities."}]}
